SEARCH
Package sudoku.rule

Class ColumnRule

java.lang.Object
sudoku.rule.Rule
sudoku.rule.ColumnRule
public class ColumnRule extends Rule
The ColumnRule class represents a rule that applies to a column in a Sudoku puzzle.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ColumnRule()
    Constructs an empty ColumnRule.
    ColumnRule(Set<Position> positions)
    Constructs a ColumnRule with a set of positions.
    ColumnRule(Position positionStart, int height)
    Constructs a ColumnRule starting from a position with a specified height.
    ColumnRule(Position positionStart, Position positionEnd)
    Constructs a ColumnRule from a starting position to an ending position.

    add, getIndexSymbols, getRulePositions, offsetRepositioning, setIndexSymbols, toString

    • ColumnRule

      public ColumnRule()
      Constructs an empty ColumnRule.

    • ColumnRule

      public ColumnRule(Set<Position> positions)
      Constructs a ColumnRule with a set of positions.

      public ColumnRule(Position positionStart, int height)
      Constructs a ColumnRule starting from a position with a specified height.

      positionStart - the starting position of the column
      height - the height of the column

      positionEnd - the ending position of the column
